title: Trimming With Fringe, 15th century
medium:
Medium: gilt foil on silk core, linen
Technique: woven
description: Trimming in a pattern of ornamented triangles. Attached is a fringe skirt of twisted loops with a plain-woven linen heading.

Trimming With Fringe, 15th century.Medium: gilt foil on silk core, linen
